---
title: "FallbackFillAction"
description: "Fill an input field with a value"
---

Only use if explicitly asked, or you failed to input with the normal fill action.

**Example:**
```python
from notte_core.actions import FallbackFillAction
# Dict syntax
session.execute({"type": "fallback_fill", "id": "difficult-input", "value": "fallback text"})
# Pydantic syntax
session.execute(FallbackFillAction(id="difficult-input", value="fallback text"))
```

</ParamField>

</ParamField>

</ParamField>

</ParamField>

</ParamField>

</ParamField>

</ParamField>
